## Question #1: Which year had the highest GDP?
```{r}
c02_data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/owid/co2-data/master/owid-co2-data.csv")
highest <- c02_data %>% 
  filter(gdp == max(gdp, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  pull(year)
```
